definition: sound of sighing/(interjection expressing surprise, sorrow, regret, disappointment etc) oh/damn/wow

sentences.english: A man complained about a "constant inexplicable cough".
sentences.chinese: 一個男士抱怨他的持續無故咳嗽。

sentences.english: A non-productive cough does not expel sputum from the respiratory tract.
sentences.chinese: 乾咳指不從呼吸道排出痰液的咳嗽。

sentences.english: This syrup is especially good for dry or tickly coughs.
sentences.chinese: 這種糖漿特別適合乾咳或喉嚨發癢引起的咳嗽。

sentences.english: He coughed with sputum and feeling of malaise. (malaise = debility)
sentences.chinese: 他咳嗽有濃痰，而且覺得很虛弱。

sentences.english: When I turned on the lights I discovered I'd coughed up a cockroach.
sentences.chinese: 我咳嗽着吐出來，打開燈一看，是一隻蟑螂。

sentences.english: Conclusion Qingjinzhike - soup has better therapeutic efficacy on coughing due to wind - heat in children.
sentences.chinese: 結論清金止咳湯治療小兒外感風熱咳嗽具有良好效果。

sentences.english: His voice was drowned by the coughing of the audience.
sentences.chinese: 他的聲音被聽衆的咳嗽聲淹沒了。

sentences.english: Objective To study the etiology of pertinacious chronic cough in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討小兒難治性慢性咳嗽的病因。
黛拉和往常一樣哭着，咳嗽着。

sentences.english: Schools should promote hand hygiene and respiratory etiquette and be stocked with appropriate supplies.
sentences.chinese: 學校應提倡手部衛生和咳嗽禮儀並適當儲備相關物資。

sentences.english: Sleeping through the night without episodes of coughing and wheezing.
sentences.chinese: 夜間睡眠時無咳嗽和喘鳴。

sentences.english: I need some more cough medicine.
sentences.chinese: 我還需要多一些咳嗽藥。

sentences.english: Micturition or cough also can cause ache.
sentences.chinese: 排尿或咳嗽也可誘發疼痛。

sentences.english: Jimmy coughed and choked on a piece of sausage.
sentences.chinese: 正喫着香腸的吉米聽到這個消息被嗆得連聲咳嗽。

definition: sound of sighing/(interjection expressing surprise, sorrow, regret, disappointment etc) oh/damn/wow
bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)

pinyin: shang4 hu1 xi1 dao4 gan3 ran3

definition: to catch cold/(common) cold/CL:場|场[chang2],次[ci4]/(coll.) to be interested in (often used in the negative)/(Tw) to detest/can't stand
